name: Golden Goblin Rush
description:
Get this! You just robbed a bank, BUT your tiny goblin body is having trouble escaping with all that weight! You have to throw the gold to lighten the load, but don't throw too much or it'll have all been for nothing!

This is my first game jam and the second game I've made! Even though we had to cut most of the game still super proud of it!

This has been an amazing learning experience and I most definitely want to hear any suggestions/constructive criticism/bugs yall find.

Known Bugs:

-Sometimes you randomly lose all forward momentum when you collide with the ground 

-you keep your velocity through death/respawn

-the effect of having less weight is not very pronounced
